4.3 i2 TP2

1. Select Profile from the menu: Run->Profile...
2. Double click on Java Application.
3. Choose a package that has been imported or created previously in Java Perspective, i.e. HelloWorld
3a. Choose Execution Time Analysis
4. Click Run
5. Open Execution Statistics view
6. Click on Class button in toolbar

Problem: NPE occurs
